prompt_results.prompt_text: Turn on the Office WLED every day at 7:00 AM
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: office_wled_on_7am
alias: Office WLED on at 7AM
description: "Turn on the Office WLED strip every day at 7:00 AM with consistent brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: "07:00:00"
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 200

description: "After sunset every day, turn on the Living Room light for 5 minutes, then turn on the Office WLED light, wait 30 seconds, and finally turn off the Living Room light."

    target:
      entity_id: light.wled

prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness, wait 10 seconds, then turn off the Office WLED
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_light_cue_office_wled'
alias: Living Room Lights Cue Office WLED
description: "When any living room light turns on between 21:00 and 23:00, briefly set Office WLED to 20% brightness as a visual cue, then turn it off after 10 seconds, restoring prior state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id:
      - light.hue_office_back_left
      - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
      - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_living_room_cue
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room_cue

prompt_results.prompt_text: Every 15 mins choose a random effect on the Office WLED device. Play the effect for 15 secs. Choose random effect, random colors and brightness to 100%. At the end of the 15 sec the WLED light needs to return to exactly what it was before it started.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'wled_office_random_burst_15min'
alias: WLED Office - random effect every 15 minutes
description: "Every 15 minutes, play a random WLED effect at 100% brightness for 15 seconds, then restore the previous Office state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: '/15'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_random_burst
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 255
      rgb_color:
        - "{{ range(0,255) | random }}"
        - "{{ range(0,255) | random }}"
        - "{{ range(0,255) | random }}"
      effect: "{{ state_attr('light.wled','effect_list') | default([], true) | random if state_attr('light.wled','effect_list') is defined else 'Solid' }}"
  - delay: '00:00:15'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_random_burst

prompt_results.prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, only turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness. Wait 5 seconds after any action, then turn off all other lights that weren't part of the selected time-based action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_time_based_routine'
alias: Office WLED Time-Based Routine
description: "Time-based Office WLED routine that adjusts brightness and color temperature throughout the day, then turns off unrelated lights after 5 seconds."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '06:00:00'
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
  - platform: time
    at: '21:00:00'
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: '/10'
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '06:00:00'
            before: '09:00:00'
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 128
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 200
                - 150
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '17:00:00'
            before: '20:00:00'
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 255
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: '21:00:00'
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 51
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 170
                - 120
    default: []
  - delay: '00:00:05'
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id:
        - light.hue_go_1
        - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
        - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
        - light.hue_office_back_left
        - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
        - light.living_room_2

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living, office, selected time
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light changes state, check the time and the current brightness of the Office WLED. If it's daytime (6 AM to 6 PM) and the Office WLED is below 50%, turn it on to 70%. If it's nighttime (6 PM to 6 AM) and any living room light is above 60%, dim the Office WLED to 30%. If the Office WLED is already at the target brightness, do nothing. Wait 2 seconds between each check and action.
